title: Out Travel the System - Show Promo
description:
At Expedia -- We know travelers have a lot of questions. That’s why we constantly ask ourselves one thing: In the busy online travel space -- what does it mean to be helpful?  

Out Travel the System is a brand new podcast designed to help you dig under the surface and help you find the answers to all of your questions before, during, and after your trip. Because with more than 20,000 travel experts, partners and suppliers at our fingertips, who better to help you navigate the complex world of travel than us?  

Every other week your host, Nisreene Atassi, will be joined by experts from all over the travel industry and people just like you, sharing their stories, reviews, insider tips, tricks and hacks for how to make your next vacation a success. 

Subscribe today, and learn how to navigate the online travel space like the insiders do. PS - Got a great travel story to share or a topic you want us to cover? We’d love to hear from you! Email us at Podcast@expedia.com, or find us on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram!

author: Podcast@expedia.com (Expedia)
